summary: During the coordination call, it was discussed that Howard will collaborate with Vinod to create a workflow diagram. Additionally, Howard will also work with Diane to set up an email account. These tasks are essential for improving communication and project management.

items.title: Collaborate on workflow diagram
items.details: Howard needs to work with Vinod to create a comprehensive workflow diagram that outlines the project processes.

items.title: Set up email account
items.details: Howard will coordinate with Diane to establish a new email account for project communications.
